transforms.code:
# Extracting the device name and device description
	device_name = self.view.params.deviceName
	device_description = self.view.custom.deviceDescription
	new_name = device_name.replace("Aerobridge", "AB")
	new_description = device_description.replace("Ground Power Unit", "")
	transformed_value = new_name + new_description
	label = 'Ground Power Unit - ' + transformed_value
	return label

config.expression:
case (tag({view.custom.deviceTagPath} + '/Parameters.Description'),

'Kingfisher RTU',
'RTU Name: '+ tag({view.custom.deviceTagPath} + '/Parameters.Gateway')
+', RTU IP: '+ tag({view.custom.deviceTagPath} + '/RTU Status/Status Folder/HostIP')
+', Mode: '+ tag ({view.custom.deviceTagPath}+'/RTU Status/Status Folder/Status')
,

'GE PLC',
//Aerobridge and GP and PCA signals are from different GE PLCs, so each device should be checked seperately
//check the opc instance
'GE OPC Instance: '+ tag({view.custom.deviceTypePath} + '/Parameters.OPC Instance')
//example: to read the IP address based on GE OPC Instance. in this example OPC instance is:AB-GE-BP-ABB10,opc item path to read IP:   nsu=KEPServerEX;s=Channel1.AB-GE-BP-ABB10._System._DeviceId
+ ', GE PLC IP: '+runScript("system.opc.readValue('KEPServerEX/UA@OPSWAMSTST1.ops.aero.int', 'nsu=KEPServerEX;s='+'" +tag({view.custom.deviceTypePath}+ '/Parameters.OPC Instance') + "'+'._System._DeviceId')")
,

'Kingfisher RTU and GE PLC',
//GP and PCA signals are from KF RTU
'RTU Name: '+ tag({view.custom.deviceTagPath} + '/Parameters.Gateway')
+', RTU IP: '+ tag({view.custom.deviceTagPath} + '/RTU Status/Status Folder/HostIP')
+', Mode: '+tag ({view.custom.deviceTagPath}+'/RTU Status/Status Folder/Status')
,

'Siemens PLC',
//to be checked and completed 
'Siemens PLC IP: '+ tag({view.custom.deviceTagPath} + '/Parameters.IP Address')+', Mode: '+tag ({view.custom.deviceTagPath}+'AMS Panel/PLC Status/Status Folder/Mode Desc')
+', Moxa Gateway IP: ' + tag ({view.custom.deviceTagPath}+'/DB Meter/Hostname')
,

'error in UDT: /Parameters.Description')
